TopicTitle: Fanwork Friday: A Collage of Explosions

Articles.Content: Deviantartist Kraftkirby made a collage of all his recent explosions, quite probably to serve as a reminder that no Kerbal is safe in his presence.

XD I approve heartily. First?

UPDATE: First!
Looks like my space program. Thank the Kraken for Revert Flight!
Revert is for cowards. Learn to plan for failure and hold funerals for the fallen.

> 
> Deviantartist Kraftkirby made a collage of **ALL** his recent explosions, quite probably to serve as a reminder that no Kerbal is safe in his presence.

All his explosions? Surely he had more than that?! He mustn't be playing the game right if that's all he's had recently! [/sARCASM]

> 
> All his explosions? Surely he had more than that?! He mustn't be playing the game right if that's all he's had recently! [/sARCASM]

I was about to correct you until I saw the [/sARCASM].

Nice collage!
